com.genband.kandy.api.services.common

Interface IKandySession


  • public interface IKandySession
    This interface is used to gather information about sessions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IKandyDomain getKandyDomain() 
      IKandyUser getKandyUser()

    • Method Detail

      • getKandyUser

        IKandyUser getKandyUser()
        Returns:
        The Kandy user info.

      • getKandyDomain

        IKandyDomain getKandyDomain()
        Returns:
        The Kandy domain info.

      • getUTCTimestampCorrection

        long getUTCTimestampCorrection()
        The difference between System.currentTimeMillis() and the received server timestamp in milliseconds.

        Use add this value to all received events timestamp.

         Example
        upon KandyChatServiceNotificationListener.onChatReceived(com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.IKandyMessage, com.genband.kandy.api.services.calls.KandyRecordType) event
  
        calculete the corrected timestamp: IKandyEvent.getTimestamp() + getUTCTimestampCorrection()
        This value is updated upon success response of:
        • KandyAccess#login(String, com.genband.kandy.api.access.KandyLoginResponseListener)
        • KandyChatService#pullEvents(KandyResponseListener)
        Returns:
        The updated timestamp in milliseconds.

      • setServerConfiguration

        void setServerConfiguration(JSONObject serverConfiguration)
        save json object for Current server configuration
        Parameters:
        serverConfiguration - - a json object
